author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3646 'record-only merges create self-referential mergeinfo'.
Prevents creation of self-referential mergeinfo (i.e. mergeinfo that
is redundant with a path's natural history).  Self-referential mergeinfo
is a source of confusion at best and a source of bugs at worst (e.g.
WCNG work on trunk necessitated a backport branch.
r948512 is a new test for the issue and r949307 is the fix.

author: antelder
msg: Add a ***running*** string to the output to show which composites in an installed contribution are running

author: antelder
msg: Update the node xml processor to support reading the extra attributes

msg: PIG-1649: FRJoin fails to compute number of input files for replicated input  (adding file missed in prev checkin)
